SELECT ap.*, d.* FROM all_product ap JOIN ( SELECT companyid, category, category2, flavor, SUM(quantity) AS total_amount FROM buyproduct WHERE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(setdate, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1), 'YYYY-MM') GROUP BY companyid, category, category2, flavor ) bp ON ap.companyid = bp.companyid AND ap.category = bp.category AND ap.category2 = bp.category2 AND ap.flavor = bp.flavor LEFT JOIN discount d ON ap.num = d.num ORDER BY bp.total_amount DESC
